{"id":312595851,"lang":"python3","time":"1 year, 4 months","timestamp":1584253921,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"60 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/312595851/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"ZigZag Conversion","memory":"13.1 MB","code":"class Solution:\n    def convert(self, s, numRows):\n        import math\n        n = len(s)\n        if n == 0 : \n            return ''\n        if numRows <= 1 : \n            return s \n            \n        split_size = 2*numRows-2\n        num_splits = int(math.ceil(n / float(split_size)))\n        ans_strs = ['' for i in range(numRows)]\n        for i in range(num_splits):\n            split = s[i*split_size : min((i+1) * split_size,n)]\n            split_size = len(split)\n            down = split[:min(split_size,numRows-1)]\n            up = split[numRows-1:]\n            for i,char in enumerate(down) : \n                ans_strs[i]+=char\n            for i,char in enumerate(up):\n                ans_strs[numRows-1-i] += char\n        ans = ''\n        for row in ans_strs: \n            ans += ''.join(row)\n        return ans\n\n","compare_result":"","title_slug":"zigzag-conversion"}
